title: Pull request merge from AlexandreAbraham/nilearn:globbing to nilearn/nilearn:master

text:
LGTM +1.

Side comment: Maybe one could also mention it in [the online documentation](http://nilearn.github.io/manipulating_images/manipulating_images.html#loading-your-own-data-filenames-or-nibabel-objects).

All CI are green. 
Merging, thanks !
